project_abstract.cdata: The objective of the Enterprise Reform Project is to learn from innovative methods for the reform of China's state-owned enterprise sector. Its development objectives are to identify and adapt potential improvements in enterprise reform methods to local circumstances, test their feasibility through pilot implementation, and make these lessons widely known among local and central policy-makers. Components of the projects consist of a) restructuring models for large and medium enterprises; b) management development; c) retraining and reemployment of "laid off" state-owned enterprise employees; and d) development of private small and medium enterprises. Each component will be implemented in the following areas: Changsha, Shenyang, Wuhan, and Wuhu.

P060270.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>企业改革项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是学习创新方法，用于开展中国国有企业改革。项目的发展目标是找出并因地制宜地完善企业改革方法，通过试点应用测试其可行性，在地方和中央决策者中广泛传播相关经验教训。本项目设有以下几个子项目：（1）大中型企业重组；（2）管理层能力建设；（3）下岗职工留用和再就业；（4）中小私营企业发展。这些子项目将在长沙、沈阳、武汉和芜湖四市实施。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
